channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Circle CEO spells doom scenario for US dollar in warning to Congress
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Jeremy Allaire claimed the U.S. dollar is “under threat” and urged lawmakers to pass stablecoin regulation to “build trust” in a digital dollar.

item.title: Interactive NFTs the future for sport, Vegas Sphere excites: NFT Collector
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Greg Oakford
item.description: Andy Murray, UFC, women’s golf and NBA embrace unique NFTs as the interactive future for sport fans, and meet NFT Creator tjo.

item.title: Hidden as colors, crypto seed phrases could hide in plain sight, says dev
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Speaking to Cointelegraph, Entero Positivo argued typical seed phrase storage methods are too obvious, so he devised a way to hide a crypto wallet in plain sight.

item.title: XRP becomes 4th largest crypto after Ripple's partial win over SEC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: XRP’s market capitalization surged by more than $21 billion in just three hours.

item.title: Demand is driving the price of Bitcoin to $130K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Daniele Bernardi
item.description: My data accurately predicted when Bitcoin would decline in 2021. Today, it’s indicating that Bitcoin will climb to $130,000 — and possibly higher.

item.title: Texas Blockchain Council director announces run for State House
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The director of Bitcoin mining analytics at the TBC said he was opposed to the Fed’s exploration of a central bank digital currency and planned to push for “digital freedom.”

item.title: UK bill on online safety should apply in the metaverse, say lawmakers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Several members of the House of Lords voiced concerns about children’s online activities in legislation aimed at regulating “anything communicated by means of an internet service.”

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Bitcoin price rallies to $31.8K, but derivatives data highlights BTC bears’ advantage
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Bitcoin’s price is following in XRP’s footsteps by rallying close to $32,000, but the price could pull back in the face of this week’s $720 million options expiry.

item.title: CleanSpark’s Bitcoin mining capacity hits 8 EH/s as new facility goes live
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The Bitcoin mining company kicked off the second phase of its mining campus in Georgia, gearing up for the next Bitcoin halving.

item.title: Coinbase’s Base launches mainnet for builders, will onboard users in August
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Base’s layer-2 mainnet has launched, allowing builders to deploy contracts, while users will be welcomed to the network in August.

item.title: Why is the crypto market up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: why is the crypto market up today
item.description: The crypto market is up today as Bitcoin price hit a new year-to-date high and Ripple’s victory against the SEC appears to lift the entire market.

item.title: US crypto exchanges give XRP listings a second chance after court ruling
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: After two years, Coinbase said it will reenable XRP trading, Kraken and iTrustCapital announced they had already relisted the token, and exchanges including Gemini may follow suit.

item.title: FTC takes aim at OpenAI's ChatGPT with lengthy criminal investigation questionnaire
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The U.S. federal agency wants to know if the revolutionary AI tool has sound privacy practices and whether it has led to consumer harm.

item.title: Why is XRP price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: Why is XRP price up today
item.description: XRP price soars following a Federal court ruling that the altcoin is not a security.

item.title: First Bitcoin futures contract debuts in Argentina
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: According to Matba Rofex, the trading platform behind the investment vehicle, the first Bitcoin futures contract in Latin America has begun trading.

item.title: US Attorney’s Office announces criminal fraud charges against Alex Mashinsky
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Authorities said they had reached a “non-prosecution agreement” with Celsius, but former CEO Alex Mashinsky will face criminal charges related to fraud and misleading users.

item.title: Breaking: Judge rules XRP is not a security in SEC's case against Ripple
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: CEO Brad Garlinghouse recently opined that the case would end soon, but the fight for crypto wasn’t over yet.

item.title: BTC price due for $31K as analyst says ‘disinflation’ boosting Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin and crypto markets seem ready to put in a “major move,” commentary concludes, as BTC price action coils up below $31,000.

item.title: 7 game-changing uses of ChatGPT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Liza Savenko
item.category: Discover the transformative potential of ChatGPT in daily life and explore its various applications that are unlocking new possibilities.
item.description: Discover the transformative potential of ChatGPT in daily life and explore its various applications that are unlocking new possibilities.

item.title: Breaking: Celsius Network fined $4.7B by FTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The regulator said Celsius “squandered billions in user deposits” after “duping” customers into depositing funds.

item.title: Exec shares process of setting up a business in Switzerland with Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Pietro Poretti, the city of Lugano’s director of the economic development division, said that the goal is to allow people to live in the city using only Bitcoin.

item.title: USB keystroke injectors still a threat to crypto users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: USB keystroke injection devices like the Diabolic Drive still pose a threat to unsuspecting users by installing malware to take over systems.

item.title: US SEC files lawsuit against Celsius and Alex Mashinsky
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Last week, a separate U.S. regulator, the CFTC reportedly found that Celsius and Alex Mashinsky broke several regulations before the collapse in 2022.

item.title: Former Celsius CEO Alex Mashinsky reportedly arrested
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The U.S. SEC filed a lawsuit against the bankrupt crypto lender on July 13 followed by news reports about the arrest of the former CEO Alex Mashinsky.

item.title: Bitget reserves top $1.44B, claims to be debt free
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The cryptocurrency exchange claims its total proof-of-reserves ratio has reached 223% in its latest July report.

item.title: The economics of Bitcoin halving: Understanding the effects on price and market sentiment
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Guneet Kaur
item.description: Discover how a reduction in supply affects the price of Bitcoin, and how market participants perceive and react to halving events in the dynamic cryptocurrency market.

item.title: Europe’s first spot Bitcoin ETF eyes 2023 debut after year-long delay
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Jacob Asset Management got approval from the Guernsey financial regulator in October 2021 and was set to debut on Euronext Amsterdam Exchange in July 2022.

item.title: Will Bitcoin catch up? BTC price was $40K when the dollar was previously this weak
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin has the chance to set off on a “parabolic curve” as the U.S. Dollar Index threatens to dive below 100, a popular trader says.

item.title: Telegram Wallet bot enables in-app payments in Bitcoin, USDT and TON
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Wallet, a custodial wallet bot on Telegram, says that merchants should sort out for themselves whether their jurisdictions allow them to accept payments in crypto.
